info-registry-entry.namespace-title: Namespace of Digital Library Federation Identifiers

namespace-authority.organisation-address: 1755 Massachusetts Avenue NW Suite 500, Washington DC 20036-2124

identifier-syntax.description:
Identifiers in the dlf namespace are used to identify information assets used in Digital Library Federation research and development projects.
An 'info' URI with namespace 'dlf' takes the form:
info:dlf/<dlf-project>/<project-specific-id>
dlf-project = ALPHA *( ALPHA | DIGIT )
i.e. alphanumeric with leading alphabetic character.
Values of dlf-project are assigned by the Digital Library Federation and registered at http://diglib.org/namespace/Projects.txt. At the time of this registration the only valid dlf-project value is "Aquifer".
project-specific-id = project-specific-component *("/" project-specific-component)
project-specific-component = *pchar
pchar is as defined in RFC 3986, that is:
pchar = unreserved | pct-encoded | sub-delims | ":" | "@" unreserved = ALPHA | DIGIT | "-" | "." | "_" | "~" pct-encoded = "%" HEXDIG HEXDIG sub-delims = "!" | "$" | "&" | "'" | "(" | ")" | "*" | "+" | "," | ";" | "="
ALPHA, DIGIT, AND HEXDIG are as defined in RFC 2234: upper or lower case alphabetic (A-Z | a-z), decimal digit (0-9), and hexadecimal digit (DIGIT | "A" | "B" | "C" | "D" | "E" | "F") respectively.
Percent Encoded Characters
No characters in general need to be percent encoded.

identifier-normalization.description: All identifiers in the dlf namespace are case-sensitive.

namespace-information.description:
Identifiers in the dlf namespace are used to identify information assets used in Digital Library Federation research and development projects. Identifiers will vary according to project. Their uses currently include:
* Target namespaces for XML Schema, for example: info:dlf/Aquifer/AssetActions/AssetDefinition/
* Identifiers for use in ontologies, for example RDF property labels, such as: info:dlf/Aquifer/AssetActions/getWebView

service-mechanism.description: No service mechanisms are at present defined.
